name: Sketch-up-multitouch
tagline: Multitouch Extension Module coded in Ruby.
body:
This project aims at adding Multitouch ability to Google SketchUp Using Gestures the end user will be able to orbit, pan, zoom, modifydraw , resize, modify models in 3D within the SketchUp UI. Showcase:
[![Video showcase](http://db.tt/hZenw5ap)](http://vimeo.com/18988094)

Originally hosted [here](https://code.google.com/p/sketchupmultitouch/)
*** GSoC 2009 project
[![GSoC 2009](http://db.tt/Uai2WuQE)](http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2009)
**Student:** Anirudh Sharma
**Mentor:** Pawel Solyga
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
